channel.title: Nvm
channel.description: Never mind, I'll just add 2billion items that way it will never go all the way down.

item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote="[-J O H N-"]link=topic=217295.msg1890895#msg1890895 date=1195719240]

You won’t be able to just to let you know, AND

[quote author=[-J O H N-] link=topic=217295.msg1890815#msg1890815 date=1195716798]
I don’t have a clue, If you add too many items it’ll give you errors, but JaGex has it so yes its possible and no I don’t think we discovered it yet.

Where the hell have you seen a shop in runescape that has billions of items??

imo, it depends on the NPC. Some npcs can hold more items than others.
[/quote]

Java wake up mate He was talking about shops. I think you’v helped too many ppl today, go take a nap ;)[/quote]

My bad, long day lol. Can’t wait till black friday <3!

Read full topic
